bibl.title: The Babatha Archive: A Review Article.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Naphtali LEWIS (edited by), The Documents from the Bar Kokhba Period in the Cave of Letters: Greek Papyri. Aramaic and Nabatean Signatures and Subscriptions, edited by Yigael YADIN and Jonas C. GREENFIELD (Jerusalem, 1989).
